alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:53PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fall River County through 900 PM MDT... At 752 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Oelrichs, or 24 miles south of Hot Springs, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oelrichs around 810 PM MDT. Angostura Reservoir around 855 PM MDT. Cascade Falls around 900 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Angostura Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
